CustomField.description: Measurement rating of the client's ability to manage E&S risks, based on the client's commitment, capacity and track record in relation to E&S issues. Sourced from completion of the CRA (client risk assessment) in the E&S screening tool.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Measurement rating of the client's ability to manage E&S risks, based on the client's commitment, capacity and track record in relation to E&S issues. Sourced from completion of the CRA (client risk assessment) in the E&S screening tool.
CustomField.label: Client Risk
